description: Contempt by Design: — The Overlap — Medium
extended: Those of us in the global consumer class are told every day that everything is changing. Things are apparently changing at an ever-accelerating rate. There is nothing you can do but try to adapt. The cause of all this change is technological innovation.

description: Saul Williams - Ashes / Think Like They Book Say - 2/3/2016 - Paste Studios, New York, NY - YouTube
How News Genius Silences Writers | My business is generally pleasurable.
extended: I moderate Facebook comments all day. While the rest of the Internet shuts off comments on publications, Facebook comments aren’t going anywhere—they count as engagement to help rank posts in the newsfeed, and there is no way for an admin to turn them off.
